definitions.definition: To make brighter or clearer; to illuminate.
definitions.example: to lighten an apartment with lamps or gas; to lighten the streets

definitions.definition: To become brighter or clearer; to brighten.
To burst forth or dart, as lightning; to shine with, or like, lightning; to flash.
To emit or disclose in, or as if in, lightning; to flash out, like lightning.
To illuminate with knowledge; to enlighten.
To alleviate; to reduce the burden of.
definitions.example: Sorrow can be lightened by being openly brought out.

definitions.definition: To make light or lighter in weight.
To make less serious or more cheerful.
To become light or lighter in weight.
To become less serious or more cheerful.
